title: Square Co-Founder on Funding for a COVID-19 Vaccine
itunes:title: Square Co-Founder on Funding for a COVID-19 Vaccine
description:
Jim McKelvey, Co-Founder of Square, discusses funding for coronavirus vaccine development and the impact that the pandemic has had on entrepreneurs. He also talks about how moments of disruption open the doors for innovation.

Hosts: Jason Kelly and Scarlet Fu. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
